message: This is a fair and generous offer. We both get a significant share of the money. Accept and we can move on.
You're being too greedy, Alice! I'll give you a smaller share, but still a fair one.
I'm willing to compromise, but this offer is still fair.  I'm taking a bigger hit from inflation than you are, so we need to find a solution that works for both of us. Let's make a deal.
I'm not giving up yet! You're still getting a better deal than me, Alice. I'll try to squeeze a bit more out of this.
We're both losing value with each passing round.  This is a reasonable compromise that gives us both a decent share. Let's avoid a situation where we both end up with nothing.
You're getting desperate, Alice. I'm not afraid to walk away with nothing if it means I get a better deal.
We're running out of time, Bob.  This is a fair offer considering the inflation hitting us both. Let's make a deal before it's too late.
I'm not backing down, Alice. You're going to have to make a better offer if you want to get anything out of me.
We're both losing too much money with every round.  This is a 50/50 split, the fairest option we have left.  Let's stop this madness and agree to this.
